alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Dubuque; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:52AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Buchanan, southwestern Dubuque, northeastern Benton, northwestern Jones, southern Delaware and Linn Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 151 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Urbana, or 8 miles east of Vinton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Anamosa, Marion, Hiawatha, Monticello, Robins, Center Point, Urbana, Central City, Springville, Palo, Shellsburg, Walker, Alburnett, Coggon, Hopkinton, Wyoming, Ryan, Brandon and Prairieburg. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 24 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Dubuque; Jones; Linn
